remarks: Lemma for ~ lbsext .  The set ` S ` is the set of all linearly independent sets containing ` C ` ; we show here that it is nonempty. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
statement:

lbsext.s $e |- S = { z e. ~P V | ( C C_ z /\ A. x e. z -. x e. ( N ` ( z \ { x } ) ) ) } $.
lbsextlem1 $p |- ( ph -> S =/= (/) ) $.
